Integrations

Visual Studio

Visual Studio is a development platform inspired by the way you work. From open source to business, you can host and review code, manage projects, and build software alongside 40 million developers.

Codekeeper integrates directly with developer workflows on Visual Studio and other popular SCM-platforms. Source code deposits into the escrow are encrypted and fully automated. No coding required!

Get Started with Software Escrow

Codekeeper is the easy and affordable solution for software developers and publishers to save time, money, and increase sales. Set up your first escrow today to protect your code and data.
